data.text: @JesabelRaay @Dudeseid I'd change leo for Johnny Depp

@JesabelRaay @Dudeseid Batman - Ben Affleck
Joker - Heath Ledger would be more effective than Joaquin Phoenix 
Nightwing - Zac Efron
Red Hood - Taron Egorton
Two Face - Matthew McConaughey 
Riddler - Jhonny Depp
Catwoman - Kate Beckinsale
Penguin - Robin Lord Taylor
Mr. Freeze - Woody Harrelson

@JesabelRaay @Dudeseid God, when that rumor was circulating about Leo back when, I was like "fucking perfect". There needs to be a Riddler on screen, he's one of the only people to make Batman detect shit.
@JesabelRaay Finally somebody showing love for Kate Beckinsale, not only is she gorgeous but talented as well
@JesabelRaay Ed Harris would be fantastic as well, as Freeze or Brainiac. I always wanted the trend of Watchmen actors appearing in the DCEU to continue with Matthew Goode for Brainiac too

@JesabelRaay @Dudeseid After True Detective, I haven't seen him in anything as amazing as that show and would love to see him play a conflicted character, like Harvey. Also, I just want to see him and Woody act together on-screen, again. They were awesome.
@JesabelRaay @Dudeseid I like this casting. Especially, Kate as Catwoman. McConaughey as Harvey is an interesting choice.
@JesabelRaay Woody Harrelson as Mr. Freeze is also great casting that I never considered before. That character is  due for a modern day reinvention
@JesabelRaay I’m so sad about Phillip Seymor Hoffman’s death in general but also because he would’ve been the *perfect* Penguin
